text: Saracens are a rugby club based in London, England who play in the Aviva Premiership. ==League position== Season League Position 2010/11 Aviva Premiership Champions 2011/12 Aviva Premiership 3rd 2012/13 Aviva Premiership 1st ===Former position=== Category:English rugby union teams Category:1876 establishments in England Category:Sport in London
title: Saracens F.C.
